prompts: Create a fierce dark-type Pokemon with fiery accents and sharp claws.
I want to see a quadrupedal Pokemon with a sleek black body and glowing red eyes.
Generate a fire-dog Pokemon that embodies both elegance and intimidation.
Make a spooky Pokemon design featuring a dark-themed creature with a fiery tail.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments but has a wild, untamed spirit.
Design a Pokemon that combines the traits of a dog and a demon, with unique colors.
Give me a powerful quadruped Pokemon with elements of both fire and darkness.
